hero.headline: Elevating Excellence in Romanian Classical Music
hero.subheadline: We Are Classics is a cultural association and NGO dedicated to bringing classical music and its performers into the spotlight through cinematic recordings, professional promotion, and innovative cultural projects across Romania.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Creating Real Visibility and Authentic Opportunities
mission.statement: We Are Classics creates visibility and opportunities for artists, institutions, and the entire musical community. We provide cinematic-quality video and audio recordings, professional promotion, and innovative cultural projects that support both established artists and young talents while bringing fresh breath to Romania's artistic life.

excellence.title: Artistic Excellence
excellence.description: We place classical music and its performers on a pedestal worthy of their value and tradition, promoting excellence through the flagship 'We Are Classics Series' and supporting cultural institutions and festivals across Romania.

education.title: Youth & Education
education.description: We develop platforms that generate concerts for young talents and educational projects, bringing classical music closer to children through short, creative, and engaging workshops.

community.title: Social Impact
community.description: We build a community of socially engaged musicians who perform in nursing homes, hospitals, and social centers, offering moments of joy, comfort, and culture to those who need it most.

hero.title: Ateliers for Kids in Kindergartens
hero.subtitle: Teaching classical music in a very nice and simple manner
hero.cta: Bring Our Program to Your Kindergarten

mission.title: Our Educational Mission
mission.description: We believe every child deserves to experience the joy and wonder of classical music. Our specially designed ateliers introduce young minds to the world of orchestral instruments, classical composers, and the magic of live performance through creative, age-appropriate workshops that inspire curiosity and foster a lifelong love of music.

methods.title: How We Teach
methods.subtitle: Our approach combines storytelling, hands-on exploration, and interactive performance to make classical music accessible and exciting for children.

method1.title: Interactive Storytelling
method1.description: Musical tales that bring composers and instruments to life through engaging narratives children can relate to.

method2.title: Live Demonstrations
method2.description: Professional musicians perform and demonstrate instruments, allowing children to see, hear, and understand up close.

method3.title: Creative Activities
method3.description: Drawing, movement, and play-based activities that reinforce musical concepts in fun, memorable ways.

method4.title: Instrument Discovery
method4.description: Hands-on opportunities to touch, explore, and even try playing real orchestral instruments.

method5.title: Age-Appropriate Content
method5.description: Workshops tailored to different age groups, ensuring content is engaging and developmentally appropriate.

method6.title: Joyful Learning
method6.description: Above all, we prioritize creating positive, joyful experiences that inspire a love of music.

kindergarten.title: Workshops Designed for Wonder
kindergarten.description: Each atelier is a 45-minute journey into the world of classical music, designed specifically for kindergarten-aged children. Our professional musicians create an intimate, welcoming environment where curiosity is encouraged and every question is celebrated.
kindergarten.feature1: 45-minute interactive sessions perfect for young attention spans
kindergarten.feature2: Professional musicians who love working with children
kindergarten.feature3: Flexible scheduling to fit your kindergarten's routine

finalCta.title: Bring Music to Your Kindergarten
finalCta.description: Give the children in your care an unforgettable introduction to the world of classical music. Our workshops are completely free for participating kindergartens.

hero.title: Melodies of Memory
hero.subtitle: Bringing the healing power of classical music to elder care homes, hospitals, and social centers

mission.title: Our Community Mission
mission.description: We believe music has the power to heal, comfort, and connect. Our specially curated concerts bring the beauty of classical music to elderly residents in care homes, patients in hospitals, and individuals in social centers who may not have access to live performances. Each concert is designed to evoke cherished memories, provide moments of joy, and create meaningful human connections.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.subtitle: We create intimate, meaningful musical experiences tailored to the unique needs of each community.

step1.title: Intimate Settings
step1.description: Small ensemble performances designed for intimate spaces and personal connection.

step2.title: Familiar Repertoire
step2.description: Carefully selected pieces that resonate with life experiences and evoke positive memories.

step3.title: Interactive Format
step3.description: Musicians engage directly with residents, sharing stories and inviting participation.

step4.title: Therapeutic Impact
step4.description: Music proven to reduce stress, improve mood, and stimulate cognitive function.

featured.title: More Than Just a Concert
featured.description: Our community concerts are carefully designed therapeutic experiences that combine live classical music with genuine human interaction. Research shows that music can significantly improve quality of life for elderly individuals, those with dementia, and patients recovering from illness.
featured.benefit1: Reduces anxiety and agitation in residents with dementia
featured.benefit2: Stimulates memory recall and cognitive engagement
featured.benefit3: Creates moments of joy and emotional connection

venues.title: Where We Perform
venues.subtitle: We partner with care facilities and social centers across Cluj-Napoca and surrounding regions.

testimonials.title: What They're Saying
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from care staff and facility administrators

testimonial1.quote: The concerts bring so much joy to our residents. We see people who haven't smiled in weeks light up when the musicians begin to play. It's truly magical.
testimonial1.name: Maria Ionescu

testimonial2.quote: Music therapy has become an integral part of our rehabilitation program. The We Are Classic concerts provide our patients with moments of beauty and normalcy during difficult times.
testimonial2.name: Dr. Alexandru Popescu
testimonial2.role: Chief of Rehabilitation, Spitalul Clinic Municipal

finalCta.title: Bring Music to Your Community
finalCta.description: If you represent an elder care facility, hospital, or social center and would like to host one of our concerts, we'd love to hear from you. All performances are offered free of charge.
